title: 12/28/20 – HOUR 3 – The Clippers Have A Serious Chemistry Issue. PLUS, Ric Bucher!
itunes:title: 12/28/20 – HOUR 3 – The Clippers Have A Serious Chemistry Issue. PLUS, Ric Bucher!
description:
Doug Gottlieb and LaVar Arrington fill in for Dan Patrick and talk about the biggest problem facing the Clippers as they make another run at an NBA title. The guys make their picks for the postseason including which under-the-radar teams they expect to make some noise. Plus, they speak with FS1 NBA Anlayst Ric Bucher about all of the NBA’s hottest headlines! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
